languages.text: "Я начинаю понимать, почему Леди Теодора почти никогда не садилась в кресло судьи. От таких разбирательств больше вреда, чем пользы".
languages.translation_comment: Judged the RT's subjects at the Palace of Justice.

traits.locale_text: "Я начинаю понимать, почему Леди Теодора почти никогда не садилась в кресло судьи. От таких разбирательств больше вреда, чем пользы".

languages.text: "I am beginning to see why Lady Theodora barely ever sat in the judge's seat. Such proceedings cause more harm than good."
languages.translation_comment: Judged the RT's subjects at the Palace of Justice.
languages.original_text: "Я начинаю понимать, почему Леди Теодора почти никогда не садилась в кресло судьи. От таких разбирательств больше вреда, чем пользы".

traits.locale_text: "I am beginning to see why Lady Theodora barely ever sat in the judge's seat. Such proceedings cause more harm than good."
"I am beginning to see why Lady Theodora barely ever sat in the judge's seat. Such proceedings cause more harm than good."
"I am beginning to see why Lady Theodora barely ever sat in the judge's seat. Such proceedings cause more harm than good."
"I am beginning to see why Lady Theodora barely ever sat in the judge's seat. Such proceedings cause more harm than good."
"I am beginning to see why Lady Theodora barely ever sat in the judge's seat. Such proceedings cause more harm than good."
"I am beginning to see why Lady Theodora barely ever sat in the judge's seat. Such proceedings cause more harm than good."

languages.text: 「レディ・シオドーラがなぜめったに裁判官の席にお座りになかったのか、ようやく分かってきました。こうした審問は、益よりも害をもたらすことの方が多いのですね」
languages.original_text: "I am beginning to see why Lady Theodora barely ever sat in the judge's seat. Such proceedings cause more harm than good."

traits.locale_text: 「レディ・シオドーラがなぜめったに裁判官の席にお座りになかったのか、ようやく分かってきました。こうした審問は、益よりも害をもたらすことの方が多いのですね」

languages.text: "Ich verstehe langsam, warum Lady Theodora selten auf der Richterbank Platz genommen hat. Solche Verfahren richten mehr Schaden an, als sie Gutes tun."
languages.original_text: "I am beginning to see why Lady Theodora barely ever sat in the judge's seat. Such proceedings cause more harm than good."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe langsam, warum Lady Theodora selten auf der Richterbank Platz genommen hat. Solche Verfahren richten mehr Schaden an, als sie Gutes tun."

languages.text: « Je commence à comprendre pourquoi dame Théodora prenait rarement place sur le siège du juge. Ces procédures font plus de mal que de bien. »
languages.original_text: "I am beginning to see why Lady Theodora barely ever sat in the judge's seat. Such proceedings cause more harm than good."

traits.locale_text: « Je commence à comprendre pourquoi dame Théodora prenait rarement place sur le siège du juge. Ces procédures font plus de mal que de bien. »

languages.text: «Empiezo a entender por qué lady Theodora no ejercía casi nunca su privilegio judicial. Estos procesos suelen hacer más mal que bien».
languages.original_text: "I am beginning to see why Lady Theodora barely ever sat in the judge's seat. Such proceedings cause more harm than good."

traits.locale_text: «Empiezo a entender por qué lady Theodora no ejercía casi nunca su privilegio judicial. Estos procesos suelen hacer más mal que bien».

languages.text: “现在我明白了为什么西奥多拉夫人很少会坐在仲裁官的位置上，因为这样的做法弊大于利。”
languages.original_text: "I am beginning to see why Lady Theodora barely ever sat in the judge's seat. Such proceedings cause more harm than good."

traits.locale_text: “现在我明白了为什么西奥多拉夫人很少会坐在仲裁官的位置上，因为这样的做法弊大于利。”

languages.text: "Leydi Theodora'nın neden yargıç koltuğunda az zaman geçirdiğini anlıyorum. Böyle mahkemelerin yarardan çok zararı dokunur."
languages.original_text: "I am beginning to see why Lady Theodora barely ever sat in the judge's seat. Such proceedings cause more harm than good."

traits.locale_text: "Leydi Theodora'nın neden yargıç koltuğunda az zaman geçirdiğini anlıyorum. Bu gidişatın yarardan çok zararı var."

languages.original_text: "I am beginning to see why Lady Theodora barely ever sat in the judge's seat. Such proceedings cause more harm than good."
